reviews.text: We came in here thinking this will be an authentic italian cuisine with good food but unfortunately it was horrible from the appetizers to the main dishes the pasta, rice and spaghetti was under cooked we thought we chew on rubber the lamb chops my brother ordered took a bite and almost threw up and the grilled shrimp we ordered on the side was burnt with flame gun from the top and was raw in the inside fries was cold the only thing we liked was the San pellgrino drink after we spoke to the waiter named Edwin L that the food tasted weird and everything was undercooked he immediately left with out saying anything or apologizing and came back with the check book and told us to pay so we paid $180 for a food that we didnâ€™t eat and they throw it away
I love this place! The decor is amazing - cozy and intimate. Great place for a romantic evening or a night out with family.
Everything was delicious Edison was great .. very attentive and very, very sweet.. Francesca is the best and the Billy, the manager very attentive to her as well

My aunt brought me here for an early birthday dinner. Itâ€™s a cute little Italian restaurant. Good lighting and ambiance/atmosphere. The waiters were very nice and attentive. I had the basil pasta, Ceasar salad and chocolate mousse cake for dessert. The food was delicious. Salad had fresh shaved cheese on it and the dressing wasnâ€™t too fishy. As Ceasar can sometimes has the anchovy taste. The basil pasta was delicious, the grilled chicken in it was seasoned and cooked well. Chocolate mousse cake was amazing. Billy (who I believe is the owner) is funny and hospitable. He was joking with my
Family and myself. Great vibes! He was pleased to have us and Gave us hugs as we left. Very Italian of him, made me feel like family. Thank you for the delicious food and great service!

Best girls/ladies lunch ever! Always love the dishes at Trattoria 35 whether it's the best spinach salad, calamari, grilled octopus, pizza... Even the lattes are tops! Major thanks to our server Jose and the staff .. you're the best!

On behalf of The Center for the Women of New York, I want to thank Trattoria 35 for their generous and delicious donation of meatballs to our Taste of the World at Fort Totten gala.

Let me tell you, these were not just any meatballs. They were giant, hearty, and full of incredible flavor. They were clearly made with care and authentic recipes, and they were a massive hit with all of our guests. Everyone was talking about them!

It is because of local businesses like Trattoria 35 that care deeply about our community that events like ours are possible. Their support helps us raise crucial funds for the vital work we do supporting women. This kind of generosity is exactly why I make a point to support businesses that give back.

I highly recommend Trattoria 35. I will definitely be visiting their restaurant soon to show my support, and I encourage everyone to do the same. Thank you for your kindness and for making such a positive impact.
We had a nice dinner experience. The staff was very helpful, service on point and friendly atmosphere. The food was good !
Todo muy rico , muy buen servicio

Such a shame, this place used to be great back when I was younger.

Hot water had an off taste, either the cup wasnt cleaned properly or the metal leached into the hot water.

Salad had a bit of sand, which is a minor issue so me and my party just ate/ignored it.

Octopus dish was cooked okay.

Bread basket was good and warm.

Entrees were inedible. They forgot our order and other tables were served ahead of my group (even though they arrived and ordered later). No1 came over to apologize, I had to make eye contact with a waiter to get a response, who said our food was coming. When the food came the waiter said the kitchen forgot our ticket. It looked like the kitchen rushed our entrees because of how bad it was. My pasta was served with so much extra liquid it was like soup. We compared it to the table next to us who got the same pasta, ours soup, theirs fine. The other entree had lukewarm rice but piping hot fried chicken. It looks like they scooped the rice and let it sit until the chicken was cooked.

When they came to check up on us, I told them the issue. They said they would remake it, but it had already been a while and I had other plans afterwards. The manager, I think, came over and apologized. He said free coffee and dessert on the house, we said no as it was already night time, and how could dessert make up for inedible entrees? We just asked for the bill and left the food uneaten (minus the fried chicken).

I would have appreciated them comping at least one entree but they didn't. By the time we were leaving and got to the front door, they said they would have done something to compensate us. Why didnt you offer to compensate a dish when you heard the issue at our table? I guess empty words are easier to offer when the guests are already leaving.

All in all, I shouldnt have come back looking for the good food I had in the past. This place would have been a good memory but know it just leaves a bad taste in my mouth.
Nice family restaurant! Brick oven pizza was delicious ğŸ˜‹
Devious food and drinks. I had a peach martini and it was delicious also!!

Very rude and terrible service. One of the worst restaurant I've been to. Food wasn't that amazing. Disgusting attitude from the server the whole time who can't help themselves but throwing attitude at paying customer.

I suspect that it's because I'm an Asian woman that it happened. Despite making the reservation beforehand, they gave us the table at the innermost corner right by the bathroom. Just when we walked in. We hadn't disturbed anyone or anything but just when we walked in and the moment they saw our faces, they led us that table by the bathroom. There were other tables available. We asked the server if they could move us to a different table because it was so dark and we were there to celebrate a special occasion, the server flat out refused. The whole time, we felt berated by the server. I will never come back and tell all my family and friends to never visit this restaurant.

The food was very tasty, and everything was cooked on point. We had the baked clams and grilled calamari for appetizers, and both were tasty. The entrees were very tasty as well, I had the shirt steak,  which came with mashed potatoes and veggies, everything was seasoned and cooked to perfection. The other guests that were with me got the salmon, seabass, and chicken, and they all loved their food as well. Great wine and drinks selection. Overall, excellent service,  atmosphere, and food, the staff were very friendly and helpful, I would certainly eat here again and would recommend it to anyone.
Good food/great environment.

Excellent service, delicious food, friendly and welcoming atmosphere, ambience; waiters are attentive and accommodating;
It is 5 out of 5.

When I say THE MUSIC, VIBE AND ATMOSPHERE IS OUTSTANDING, TOP NOTCH SERVICE and I'm not even sure or do I care how much we spent, I DEFINITELY RECOMMEND WITH MORE THAN 2 THUMBS UP. .. PLEASE MAKE SURE TO MAKE YOUR WAY DOWN, YOU WON'T BE DISAPPOINTED ğŸ¤—ğŸ¤—ğŸ¤— This is my first time and definitely won't be my last... BILLY AND HIS STAFF, WE THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR THE SERVICE AND YOUR EXPRESSO MARTINI IS OUT OF THIS WORLD

Upon entering the establishment you are greeted by a handsome Maitre d to start the dining experience. Lovely atmosphere and nice service!  A must to try is the Cauliflower alla Carolina, it is delicious.

Nice restaurant to go with family. Good seating arrangement ams environment. Delicious food with variety of menu choices.  Service is good and quick. Pizza size is pretty big. Valet parking option available but also there plenty of street parking around.
Great service and food. I ordered the chicken parm and spaghetti and it was delicious. Will be going back again for a very nice meal and drink. Definitely recommend it.

Upon entrance youâ€™re greeted with friendliness and when sitting down, with attentiveness. The food was excellent and well worth coming to. Billy was a pleasure and I would recommend this restaurant to anyone.
Excellent meal and service !!!

My family and I have been here a few times already and itâ€™s the same story each time. Great food, fabulous service and true appreciation for our business. The staff is genuinely wonderful. They are timely but not overbearing,  very personable and professional. The food is delicious. I can definitely say that their seafood salad is the best Iâ€™ve ever had. Their menu pricing is very reasonable across the board. Itâ€™s not inexpensive but very fair.  There is nothing not to love about this place.
Big portions and delicious food

The place has a great vibe that makes you feel comfortable. I truly enjoyed the delicious food that was offered. The servers were always attentive and made sure we were taken care of. The management was super kind and helpful, making the experience even better. Overall, it's a great place to have dinner!

Unfortunately the food here was so horrible. We got stuffed mushrooms, mussels, chicken parm and the ribeye. Food was absolutely flavorless. Only thing decent was the mushrooms. Saltless, no seasonings. Just very horribly put together. Spent over $150 on garbage.
Always have a good experience here. Love it

Appalling, arrogant, and downright disgraceful.

Trattoria 35 â€” youâ€™ve officially lost all credibility.

Tonight my husband called to place a simple takeout order at 9 PM â€” an hour before your posted closing time. Instead, he was met with pure condescension and outright disrespect by a staff member named Max. Without even asking what he was calling for, Max dismissively said: â€œThe kitchenâ€™s closed. Itâ€™s Fatherâ€™s Day. Sorry for the inconvenience. Have a nice night,â€ and hung up the phone.

Hung up. On a customer. Mid-sentence.

My husband called back â€” not to argue â€” but simply to understand why he was abruptly disconnected. And the response? Max smugly declared: â€œI knew you would argue and I didnâ€™t want to argue. Itâ€™s Fatherâ€™s Day,â€ before hanging up again.

This is not just poor customer service â€” this is contempt for your customers. Max took it upon himself to close the restaurant early and treated a paying customer like an annoyance simply because he decided he didnâ€™t feel like working anymore. Apparently at Trattoria 35, customers exist at the whim of whatever mood your staff happens to be in.

Letâ€™s be crystal clear:
â€¢	Your posted hours are until 10 PM.
â€¢	Your kitchen was open.
â€¢	Your staff flat-out refused service, lied, and then handled it with arrogance and juvenile behavior.

Max is the face of your restaurant tonight. His behavior was unprofessional, hostile, and completely unacceptable. If this is the type of person you allow to represent your business, it says everything anyone needs to know about the management behind the scenes.

There are dozens of far superior restaurants in this city where customers are treated with basic decency â€” something your staff apparently feels is optional. After tonight, Trattoria 35 is permanently off our list â€” and Iâ€™ll make sure anyone who asks knows exactly why.

Pathetic.

We celebrated my sisterâ€™s birthday at Trattoria 35 today. It was a delightful experience. Everyoneâ€™s food was super delicious and the service was exceptional. Our waiter Danny could not have been more accommodating. The bus boy was also attentive and pleasant. We had brought my sister some fresh flowers and they brought over a water pitcher to keep them fresh. They also put a candle in her cannoli and everyone sang Happy Birthday to her. It was all and all a wonderful experience.

Late night dinner date w/hubby was soooo cool!! BIG Thanks to the bartender David and the general manager/boss man (Sorry, forgot name) for their true hospitality.  Great Italian spot, delicious, and plenty food options.  It's best not to go there too hungry, cause you'll order lots!

We both started with ğŸ«’ olives, bread ğŸ & cheese ğŸ§€. Then, we moved to our soups, tortellini in chicken broth for me and classic lentil for him. Just because I'm greedy, I also added fried mozzarella before our entrÃ©e.

We each paired our dishes with great wines, a German Reisling for me & a Sangria for him. Dinner ğŸ½  came, and I had Chicken Milanese, and he had Penne A la Vodka w grilled octopus ğŸ™ and calamari. EVERYthang was DELICIOUS ğŸ˜‹ and I can't wait to go back for another great dish and atmosphere. ğŸ‘ ğŸ‘ ğŸ‘ ğŸ‘ ğŸ‘
50th Anniversary Party, wait staff was efficient and just right amount of kind and friendly Everthing tastes delicious.
On a business trip in NYC and it was the best meal I have had in some time in a restaurant. Nice, clean dinning room and service was great. Excellent food! Give them a try if you havenâ€™t!

A beautiful restaurant with elegant professional service. It starts with the Maitre D.  You are greeted like an old friend and seated quickly. The service is impeccable. Everyone from the servers to the busboys (didn't see any female busgirls) were quick, efficient and friendly. Never had to ask for anything. It was automatically taken care of or refilled. This is the place to take anyone when you are looking to impress. Everything was cooked to perfection. Be sure to try the Stuffed mushroom appetizer as well as the Grilled Calamari. They were delicious.

I had my Uncle's Celebration of Life ceremony here, it was awesome!  The food was outstanding and the service was great.
Everyone had a super great time!
Thank you!
Friendliest staff, superb service, delicious appetizers and entrees. I loved the jumbo shrimp scampi with roasted potatoes and vegetables. I look forward to returning here!
Delicious Italian food
Service was cordial and excellent right down to the valet.Food was more than questionable.  Needs  a new chef !!    I had been there a few times but now very disappointed.

If you want amazing food & outstanding service , please come here! Max & Mario are the absolute best. Everything was so delicious & they were so kind. My favorite Italian place to go to. Definitely recommend !
Excellent food and service.

Iâ€™ve been coming to this restaurant for over ten years. I used to visit often when I lived in the neighborhood, and recently, I went back after a long time and it was just as amazing as I remembered! The food still tastes just as delicious, and the service is just as warm and friendly. It felt so good to be back.
Everything on the menu is great, but their carbonara is truly exceptional! No matter what you order, you canâ€™t go wrong. Iâ€™ll definitely be returning again soon!
Omg I saw a cockroach crawling up the wall as we were eating!!!!! I really wanted to love this place but it was crawling next to my sister in laws head! Her seat was against the wall!!!

Went here with a huge party of around 15 people, and the pasta dishes here are very unique and they have a huge variety of choices. Overall, i suggest the vodka pasta. Also this restaurant has waiters who constantly are there for you and check in on you. Overall, the experience was pretty good and i enjoyed the calamari too.

The staff was so accommodating the minute we entered the establishment. The gentleman was quick to show us to a comfortable booth with a great view. The waiter escorted me to the bathroom and was very helpful to all the changes we made to our meals! The food and drinks were made with love and were so tasty! I will be back soon.

We rented a space in this restaurant for my parents 50th anniversary. It was such a beautiful ambiance and the price compared to so many other places was amazing. The food was amazing and the wine was overflowing. Many other halls the food looks frozen and heated. Everything here was fresh tasting and looked beautiful. We had the choice of salmon, chicken and steak.  I was quite impressed and compared to other places we have done events this place topped it. The service was very attentive. We had sit down dinner and the waiters took all meal requests and made sure every wine every water and every beer was full. I will definitely host another event here. It was a great venue.

Great vibes and had an amazing time! Great date night spot and the service was spectacular. The food portion was decent and the calamaris were made perfectly. It was also easy to find street parking around the block. Will most definitely be back!

This restaurant is an authentic Italian experience, the food is very generous and delicious, the decor feels warm and the staff treats you like family! Sal (pizza chef), Franchesca (bartender), and Santos (waiter) were so pleasant to interact with.

I highly recommend this restaurant for any time you feel like having a delicious meal along side with an amazing atmosphere provided by the staff.

Great food and fully Italian style cooking. Portions are perfect sizes.  Atmosphere is great as well.  Service can be a lot better/but itâ€™s all packed so will have little slow.  If you have reservations still will have to wait 10-15mins b/c of delays.
Salmon pasta was great,  chicken franchise was great as well. And fried ravioli

But food makes up for wait/service. .

We had an intimate birthday dinner for my partner and I last night and David was nothing short of amazing! He instantly caught on to me secretly wanting to sing and do a birthday song without making it obvious. He was super polite, made suggestions of the Baked clams which was awesome. The staff was upset polite and the food was fresh. Everything we ordered hit the spot even the cake and Iâ€™m not even a cake person. Deff Recc.

Let me keep this review short (which will be hard), our host Max is the most genuine and down to earth individual we've ever met in the industry. We live in the area and honestly my husband and I love coming here.

I've honestly been gatekeeping this Bayside gem
My husband had the Farfalle Al Samone and honestly he left nothing on the plate. The sauce was top tier decadent, Salmon was medium rare and cooked to perfection.

I on the other hand, had the Chicken Scarpariello on the Bone, I'm currently on a cut and this meal fits into all my macros at the end of the day. I forgot our servers name but please ask for Max when you get there ! He will make you feel at home

The place was cozy, comfortable, and I had the greatest waiter, Mike was very polite, amiable, and gave us everything we asked for and more. He went above and beyond for us, and made sure our dining experience was all we could ask for. We could tell he cares about his job and the people he serves.
I give this place five stars, as the service and food were excellent.

My 2nd time visiting. We had reservations and were seated right away. Food was served withing 15 min.Good service, very attentive and friendly. Refills for bread  water & coffe came quickly. Bread was ok ,I will rather have a regular Italian bread with no seasoning instead of the one they served warm because I found it a little greasy. Starting with appetizers, the pasta fagiole was terrible. Beans were hard, no garlic flavor and was served with a brown sauce instead of white or red sauce as other restaurants. Calamari on sauce, spicy and very taste. Mozarella Carozza is totally different from other Italian restaurants. It's breaded & fried with roasted peppers ; it was ok for my liking. Now, entrees were a different story. Veal and  chicken marsala were delicious with very little meat ,lots of mushrooms  and a sauce to die for.The Chicken/Veal Capricioso were both also good. Rigatoni Gamberetti was good but smaller serving. Desserts Tiramisu  and creme Brulee were nice.Coffe it is strong. 5 people dinner came out to $221.54 plus tip.  It's a expensive restaurant. There is a bar were you can also eat and drink. Place is not small but only have 1 bathroom for men  and 1 for female , that is terrible, so prepare to wait. No requirements for mask or vaccine. There's also valet parking but there's always 1 available on streets near by.

Exceptional service, staff, decor and delicious food. We came here to celebrate my birthday with my wife and family.
Upon entering, the polite smiling valet opened the door for us than we were helped by Francesca. Smile's and kindness all throughout our experience.
Once sat, we were greeted and served by the professional servers Santos and Ifran.
Service, food and experience, 10 stars.
Thank you all so much for helping to create a special birthday memory.
